column4: Hello guys i am having a problem when trying to use apt-get, i get a lot of 409 conflict errors, i have set up my proxy and applied system-wide, so i don't know what else to do?
weird. have you run sudo apt-get update?
did you say you're using a proxy?
k, why can't you use direct connection?
what steps have you taken, so far, to get the proxy to work with apt?
I see.... is there a result from this command:  echo $http_proxy
okay, do you know how to use vim?
then add the following line:  export http_proxy=http://user:pass@your.proxy.server:port/
let me know when you've saved and quit
you then need to run this command:  . /etc/bash.bashrc  before sudo apt-get update
